title: "Martelli Pasta" Typeface
content:
Hello!

I was wondering if anyone could help me identify the primary AND secondary typeface for Martelli Pasta.

Thank you thank you!

comments.content: MeMimas, for the most subordinate text :-)
this is so frustrating. i know i've seen this or something very much like it.
